articles.title: Russian fighter jets 'buzz' American spy plane in the Black Sea - Daily Mail
articles.description: Two Russian Su-30 fighter jets were scrambled to escort a Boeing P-8 Poseidon reconnaissance plane of the US Navy over the Black Sea late Tuesday, Moscow said.
articles.content:
Russian fighter jets have been filmed 'buzzing' a US spy plane over the Black Sea in the latest standoff between Moscow and western powers in the contested region.

articles.author: Henry Fountain
articles.title: June Was Hottest on Record for North America, Fourth Hottest Globally - The New York Times
articles.description: An analysis by European scientists found that other parts of the world didn’t fare much better, with Europe logging its second-hottest June.
articles.content: The high temperatures last month were not limited to North America, according to the Copernicus analysis. Europe suffered through its second-warmest June ever, with only June 2019 being warmer. Tempe… [+1087 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Move over Messi - Argentina has a new hero - CNA
articles.description: BRASILIA:     Emiliano Martinez needed only a month to establish himself as Argentina's number one goalkeeper and on Tuesday he became a new national hero by saving three times in a shootout in their Copa America semi-final against Colombia.

articles.title: These parts of the US could become ‘breeding grounds’ for more COVID variants - WTOP
articles.description: Out of the Covid-19 pandemic, two Americans are emerging: One protected by vaccines and the other still vulnerable to infection — and experts say progress made across the entire US is being threatened by low-vaccinated regions.
